section.audio_text: Let’s move to the aft overhead panel and finish the Engine Controls and Indicators section with a discussion of reverser alert differences. The 737 MAX has three reverser alerts: The REVERSER COMMAND light indicates that a reverser is commanded by the pilot to deploy inflight.

The REVERSER AIR/GND light indicates that the Reverser air/ground protection is lost. The REVERSER LIMITED alert replaces the REVERSER alert on the 737NG. The REVERSER LIMITED light indicates reverse thrust is unavailable on the affected engine, or is limited to reverse idle. Also note, there are new non-normal checklists associated with each of these alerts.
